prA~jcaqmupa# dadhAti dAqdhAra# yajamAnalOqkaM na pa#SUqnAM caq yaja#mAnasya ca prAqNamapi# dadhAqtyathOq KalviShTa#kAyAq AtRu#NNaqmanUpa# dadhAti prAqNAnAqmuthsRu#ShTyai draqPsaSca#skaqndEtyaqBi mRu#Satiq hOtrA$svEqvainaqM prati#ShThApayatiq srucAqvupa# dadhAqtyAjya#sya pUqrNAM kA$rShmaryaqmayI$M daqddhnaH 
pUqrNA-maudu#baMrImiqyaM ~Mvai kA$rShmaryaqmayyaqsAvau-du#baMrIqmE EqvOpa# dhattE - [  ] 38
